con:testSuite.name: Scenarios: Creating a connection for a customer with priority

con:testCase.name: Create connection for customer with priority of 60

con:config.con:query: Select * From profile Inner Join person On profile.person_id = person.id Where profile.id = 16473

con:testStep.name: Get portal access for portalId and personId

con:config.con:query: Select portal_access_id From dre_ticket Inner Join portal_access On portal_access.last_ticket_id = dre_ticket.id And portal_access.last_success_ticket_id = dre_ticket.id And dre_ticket.portal_access_id = portal_access.id Where portal_access.portal_id = 2 And portal_access.person_id = ${Get personId for profileId#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/PERSON.ID[1]}

con:testStep.name: Get tickets for portal access id

con:config.con:query: Select * From dre_ticket Where dre_ticket.portal_access_id = '${Get portal access for portalId and personId#ResponseAsXml#//Results[1]/ResultSet[1]/Row[1]/DRE_TICKET.PORTAL_ACCESS_ID[1]}'

con:entry.value: Bearer ${Get claire rest token#Response#$['access_token']}
${Create connection#Response#$['id']}
${Create connection#user_uuid}
